overviewMeta.lessDescription: Set against a backdrop of luscious greenery and serenity, JP Infra Now or Never offers a wholesome and luxurious lifestyle tailored to nourish your physical as well as spiritual well-being. JP Infra avant-garde contemporary architecture has redefined the way of living. JP Infra offers residents a wide variety of amenities to keep the family together and engaged for a weekend of fun activities.
overviewMeta.moreDescription:
As JP North Mira road is situated in the heart of North Garden City, JP Infra is the home of your dreams awaits you at Codename Now or Never. JP Infra presents "JP NORTH Garden City", the most luxurious & biggest project around Mira Road. JP Infra has 8 different towers of 23 Storeys each with 1,2 & 3 BHK in 27 Acres of land that brings you the unique & numerous amenities at your doorstep.

JP Infra North is a planned luxury development on a scale never seen before, a lavish oasis in Mira Road with spacious luxury residences ensconced in this unique garden environment, JP Infra is designed to be much more than a place to live. Exuding peace, natural beauty and impeccable style, replete with world-class amenities and fabulous luxuries, JP North offers you the life you've always wanted. JP Infra North let’s you live life at your own pace. JP Infra North offers 1 ,2 and 3 bhk apartments.

JP Infra Mira Road is presenting residences designed to give you just what you need. JP North Mira Road is giving you a chance to live, explore, and bask in nature. By the launch of JP Infra North ,it is changing the market. The concept of JP Infra North is that it is for everyone who is looking out for affordable luxurious home in Mumbai.

JP Infra Mira Road is modified with modern architecture that offers luxury apartments. JP North Mira Road is located in premium location which is conveniently close to the buzzing places. JP Infra North offers Excellent road and easy connectivity with for easy commute. JP Infra North is the perfect place for you to live a blissful life. Be a part of this grand lifestyle at JP Infra North - finest, and most successful neighborhood.

Your address is a testimony to your accomplishments. Especially because where you live, speaks volumes about the lifestyle you've always desired, and the hard work you've put in to achieve it. So here is a home that exudes your excellence. Presenting, JP North Mira Road the finest abode. JP North Now or Never Provides Nestled amidst the hustle and bustle of Mumbai suburbs, yet far detached from it, JP North is where you can enjoy abounding amenities within sedating serenity.

projectHighlightMeta.description: JP Infra Mira Road is Offering large 1, 2 & 3 BHK apartments in multi-storey wings.
JP North is meticulously master-planned and designed by our architect (Reza Kabul).
JP North Mira Road is Spread across multiple zones, there are enough engagement points to ensure one is spending more time outside of the four walls of the apartment.
JP North Mira Road has 2 Grand Clubhouses with large swimming pool, Rooftop Solar Panels.
JP Infra North Provides Green Areas and Water Harvesting.
It also has Waste Management System and Multiple Themed Gardens.
JP Infra North has Separate covered swimming pool only for ladies inside the clubhouse.
It also has Play Area, Recreational Area, Gym, Yoga, Spa-Salon, Cafe-Library, Creche & endless categories of luxury in our project.
35+ Lifestyle Amenities ,Banquet Hall, Walk ways and many more.
JP North Mira Road is surrounded by Other Schools, Colleges, Mall, Market, Clinic-Hospitals, etc. all nearby.
JP Infra North gives direct Access from Western Express Highway.
JP North Mira Road has 2 upcoming Metro stations (proposed) at just 5 minutes.
Proposed Mall, Multiplex, School, Hospital - All in the JP Infra Project's.
JP Infra North has Appx 900 Units of Smartly Planned 1BHK in 4 Wings.
Mira Road Railway Station is just 8-10 minutes.
